mapper.select: SELECT id, username, password, nickname, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt FROM users ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id, username, password, nickname, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt FROM users WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, username, password, nickname, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt FROM users WHERE username = #{username}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (username, password, nickname, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{nickname}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET username = #{username}, password = #{password}, nickname = #{nickname}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
